author: Sarah Spigelman Richter
title: A pizza place got super judgy over one pineapple-lover's order
text:
If you love pineapple on your pizza, you might feel a little wounded these days (thanks, Iceland! ). And things aren't getting any easier for you. 
One hapless twitter user tried to order her favorite tropically-topped pie and was - as Cher Horowitz might put it - brutally rebuffed by an unnamed pizza place.
